word:
But now in His own familiar voice Jesus said to her, \93Mary.\94 Now she knew that it was not a stranger who was addressing her, and turning she saw before her the living Christ. In her joy she forgot that He had been crucified. Springing toward Him, as if to embrace His feet, she said, \93Rabboni.\94 But Christ raised His hand,
216
saying, Detain Me not; \93for I am not yet ascended to My Father.\94 . . .
